TextView.android:text: We Emy Premlin, Viji, Uppretta, Nagasree are proposing a solution that uses a integration of passive sensors to capture physiological changes and estimate our emotions through a wearable band. Our device helps to increase the interaction activity between the human and device so that overall the gaming experience in Vr can be increased to the further extent. We built support vector machine (SVM) classifiers with the radial basis function (RBF) kernel for arousal and valence recognition, based on physiological signals,to classify positive and negative emotions
